case.title: Black woman for black/raced man (London)
case.text: Tall black, educated,woman for VERY TALL, dark, educated SINGLE man ,29-36yrs, IDEALLY a non Brit Raised in North America Or France. I grew up between London and New York -travel is something I enjoy (Hong Kong being one of my fav. places), I am a non smoker and would only be interested in men who do not smoke. Send a photo with your response and perhaps is things go well we can grab a coffee kensington.
